channel.title: [PI]Rune-Reality 24/7[PI] Need Some more coders :)
channel.description:
Hey everyone well this is my server "Rune - Reality" this server is new but most of my members probably remembered "Soulpking" that was shutdown due to a ddosing of the vps (we were ddosed more then 1 time). But i got bored so i decided to make "Rune - Reality" well here goes :)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Features~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[CENTER]- New Home - 95 percent dragon claws special ! -24/7 uptime - all godsword specials work - all about pking server - Vls & Swh specials not overpowered :) - dds special is instant - and alot more cant remember right now - An owner that actually listens to suggestions[/CENTER]
Well The Reason you should play Rune - Reality is because of it's 24/7 uptime great community no overpowered items such as dragon claws that ruin the server and the awesome pking that people love to do and the many bosses to fight when in the need of items also lets not forget the tasks that we must also do to get our slayer level up in order to kill monsters such as dark beasts and abyssal demons for items like an abyssal whip or a dark bow and what about the exp lock ? if your a whip pure wouldn't you like to have an explock so you don't have to get 99 attack wich will ruin your combat ? and lets not forget about the economy it isnt that bad not to hard to earn items and neither is it to easy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Pictures~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Some of our specials :)
[URL=http://img808.imageshack.us/i/soulpkingreborn.png/][IMG]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/3909/soulpkingreborn.png[/img][/URL]
Item Creating :)
[URL=http://img686.imageshack.us/i/itemmaking.png/][IMG]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/9315/itemmaking.png[/img][/URL]
A new way to train thank you demise :)
[URL=http://img132.imageshack.us/i/trainedt.png/][IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/9484/trainedt.png[/img][/URL]
Npc Rush :)
[URL=http://img835.imageshack.us/i/npcrush.png/][IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/255/npcrush.png[/img][/URL]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Videos~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[CENTER][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQ83UDuVZGU]RuneScape 2007 - Rune - Reality 24/7 pking only ![/url][/CENTER]
Always fun things to do so you won't get bored more updates coming very soon so join Rune-Reality now !

item.title: [PI]Rune-Reality 24/7[PI] Need Some more coders :)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

“A new way to train”
It’s not really training if you just cheat the 99’s by clicking something and typing the level you want.

Read full topic
